name: Kiniro no Corda 3: Another Sky feat. Shiseikan
name_original: Kiniro no Corda 3: Another Sky feat. Shiseikan
description: Kiniro no Corda 3: Another Sky feat. Shiseikan (金色のコルダ３ AnotherSky feat.至誠館) is a Rhythm/Visual Novel video game published by Koei Tecmo Games released on March 27th, 2014 for the PlayStation Portable.
